item.title: Yell (Cuts Off)
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 8 && playerRights > 0) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("[Yell]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Yell cuts off

eg:

::Yell See yells cuts off

would show [Yell] ee yell cuts off

eg ^
